text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pas/CodeSystem/PASSupportingInfoType defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patientEvent Patient EventInformation about the dates of the event that are being requested.
admissionReview Admission ReviewInformation about dates of a hospital admission being requested.
additionalInformation Additional InformationSend additional paperwork or supporting information for the request.
freeFormMessage Free Form MessageSend text messages to the UMO.
institutionalEncounter Institutional EncounterInformation about a hospital claim being requested.

name: PASSupportingInfoType
title: PAS Supporting Info Type Code System
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: Types of supporting information for a Prior Authorization Claim.

concept.definition: Information about the dates of the event that are being requested.
Information about dates of a hospital admission being requested.
Send additional paperwork or supporting information for the request.
Send text messages to the UMO.
Information about a hospital claim being requested.
